Class Leaderboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • Leaderboard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Leaderboard
extends javafx.application.Application
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents the leaderboard with the list of top 10 players. It is serializable.
    Author:
    SHUBHAM THAKRAL, TANMAY BANSAL
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkNewHighScore(int score, java.lang.String name)
      This method checks whether the given score is a new highScore or not and whether it needs to be inserted in the topScorers list or not.
      static Leaderboard deserialize()
      This static method is used to deserialize the leaderboard object stored in leaderboard.txt
      static Leaderboard getInstance()
      This gives the instance of LeaderBoard and since there is only one leadeboard hence it does so by singleton design pattern.
      void serialize()
      This method serializes the leaderboard and stores it in a file names leaderboard.txt
      void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      This method overrides the start method of Application class to display the leaderboard using FXML.
      void updateLeaderboard()
      This method updates the leaderboard according to the contents of topScorers list

      • getInstance

        public static Leaderboard getInstance()
        This gives the instance of LeaderBoard and since there is only one leadeboard hence it does so by singleton design pattern.

        This method updates the leaderboard according to the contents of topScorers list

      • serialize

        public void serialize()
               throws java.io.IOException
        This method serializes the leaderboard and stores it in a file names leaderboard.txt
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - It thrown IOException because of ObjectOutputStream

      • deserialize

        public static Leaderboard deserialize()
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        This static method is used to deserialize the leaderboard object stored in leaderboard.txt
        Returns:
        Leaderboard type object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if deserialization file not present
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if Leaderboard class file not present

      • checkNewHighScore

        public void checkNewHighScore(int score,
                              java.lang.String name)
        This method checks whether the given score is a new highScore or not and whether it needs to be inserted in the topScorers list or not.
        Parameters:
        score - is the score made by the player
        name - is the name of the player
